alert.note: Alert for Randolph (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 1:58AM CDT until August 05 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Randolph County in southwestern Illinois... Southeastern Ste. Genevieve County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 157 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ste. Genevieve, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Randolph and southeastern Ste. Genevieve Counties, including the following locations... Kellogg, River Aux Vases, and Minnith. This includes Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 141 and 150. This also includes Felix Valle House State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
